global.title: U-Dig It AI Ethics Policy
global.description: Guidelines for embedding responsible AI practices into all funnels, product pages, and reports.
global.guardrails: All AI usage must comply with GDPR, PIPEDA, and global AI ethics standards. Avoid bias, manipulation, or false claims.

fairness.statement: AI products must treat all users fairly, avoiding bias in templates, prompts, or recommendations.
implementation: Review loops for fairness in workflows

transparency.statement: Users must know when they are interacting with AI or AI-generated content.

accountability.statement: U-Dig It AI is accountable for outputs and customer impact.

privacy.statement: User data must always be handled securely and with consent.

safety.statement: AI should not produce harmful or misleading outputs.

integration.funnel: Every funnel page must include a disclaimer of responsible AI use.
integration.emails: Footers must state: ‘U-Dig It AI follows ethical AI principles — transparency, fairness, accountability.’
integration.reports: Board/investor reports must include an ESG + ethics compliance section.
integration.audits: Quarterly audits tied into sustainability_esg_playbook.json governance metrics.
